labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://quizlet.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fquizlet.com%2F) ### Comment > After a few cards are looked at this ad pops up. issue.body:
